professional.name: Flying Race
professional.desc: A game about thrust and acceleration. Fly on your jetpack through the checkpoints and avoid hitting hot air baloons! Built at Scholastic with Javascript, MatterJS, CanvasJS, and CreateJS.

professional.name: Eco Builder
professional.desc: A game about ecosystem balance and invasive species. Propagate plants and fish and hunt down the invasive lionfish! Built at Scholastic with Javascript, CanvasJS, and CreateJS.

professional.name: Master Gardener
professional.desc: Keep your plant healthy, happy, and free of pests! Built at Scholastic with Javascript, CanvasJS, and CreateJS.

professional.name: Speed Racer
professional.desc: A game about power, drag, and grip. Design your own racecar and compete against the AI. Programmed at Scholastic with Javascript, CanvasJS, and CreateJS.

professional.name: Jarrod Sport's Portfolio
professional.desc: A personal portfolio for a San Francisco based media professional. Built with jQuery.

personal.name: Stock Inflator
personal.desc: Compare a stock's price against its historcal inflation-adjusted values. Search from over 9,000 American stocks by using the company's ticker symbol. Programmed in Ruby/Rails with jQuery.

personal.name: Drone Strikes
personal.desc: Search documented unmanned military drone strikes on targets in Somalia and the Middle East. Programmed in Ruby/Rails with jQuery and PostgreSQL.

personal.name: The Old Master Project (Ongoing)
personal.desc: This is a comprehensive database and API of Old Masters artists, from the Italian Renaissance to the 19th century. Programmed in Node.js and jQuery.

personal.name: Explore the Rijksmuseum
personal.desc: Explore old masterpieces from the collection of the Dutch National Museum and save your favorites. Programmed in Node.js, jQuery, and MongoDB.
